Key:
Good grief. You made me wait quite a while.
But at long last, the time has come.
You're... Arusu? The other, black-clothed, Arusu.
No no, I'm the *real* one.
So, the one who trapped us here is...

That wasn't me. The one who controls this world
is the girl, the one you call, Maria"."

(Arusu said this and pointed towards Maria, who
was curled into a ball.)
What does that mean?

Too bad, though. Now I've become the controller.
I have been waiting. Watching your ridiculous
farce, all for this girl to learn what love is.
...*pant, pant*.
Maria?! Are you okay?!

Yes. Nothing serious happened to me. However,
there was an interference with the authority
controls, most of which were taken from me.
But, wouldn't you call it an equivalent exchange?
Equivalent exchange...?

Well, I am the one who gave this girl everything.
Her voice, her body... The information with which
she operates. Otherwise, she wouldn't exist.

I did not always exist in this world...? Are you
saying I was created from you, an irregularity?

That's right. Well, all things considered, it was
not intentional. You were created through a
distortion in this world. That is the truth.
Wha...?

Not that you need to worry or anything, but...
Something concerning had happened.
Something concerning?

Right. The moment I infiltrated this world, a
strong firewall was put around the Fraxinus'
main computer, trapping me in this world.
Trapped?

Yes. For a long time, I could not escape.
However, Shido Itsuka, you solved that problem
for me. You freed us from this world!

But I no longer need this girl, nor you.
You are free to vanish alongside her!
Arusu...! You can't be serious!

Don't call me by her name! I have my
own name, my actual name... Marina Arusu.
The name my father bestowed to me!
Marina... That's your name?

That's right. You'll no longer confuse us, right?
She and I are completely different people, and
I am the original.

I've wasted too much time here. There's no
need for me to take care of you. Farewell.

W-Wait a second! Did you think I'd just let
you monologue then walk away?!
Too bad for you.
Wha...! My body... I can't move!
Damn it. She left... Maria, are you okay?

...*pant...pant...* There is something affecting
my powers...

(Maria was sat down, taking pained, heavy
breaths. This is the work of the black-clothed
Arusu... Marina.)
...Shin, can you hear me?
This voice... Reine-san?!
Goodness. At last we make contact, just\nwhen the situation's taken a turn.

Reine-san! It's an emergency! There are
two Arusus, and the black-clothed one has
taken control of this world!
...Shin, calm down. We saw everything from\nthe outside. Perhaps I should explain?
Yes... Please.
...Then, I'll explain. From the beginning,\nour hypothesis was flawed.
The Artificial Spirit is the cause of this whole\ndebacle. It was not the white-clothed Arusu,\nbut the black-clothed one, Marina Arusu.

I kinda got that from what she told me. So,
about the world disappearing...
Yes. The world has been seized by Marina Arusu.\nHowever, that's not all. She's entered our main\ncomputer, and seized control of the Fraxinus.

Seized control of the Fraxinus?! Does that
mean Ratatoskr can't control it?!
Kannazuki is doing his best, but it is proving\nhard to recover. Our firewalls once protected\nus, but have now become our biggest obstacle.
That means, nothing can be done right now?
Unfortunately, that seems to be the case.\nWe are exploring all available options, but\nwe're limited. The ship can't move, after all.
Then, what can we do...?
...Stop the Artificial Spirit inside of the\ndigital world. Most likely, there is no\nother way.

Which means defeating Marina... But if she can
do whatever she pleases, how can we stop her?
...There is... a way.
Maria?! Are you able to move?

Because 90% of the Fraxinus' mainframe has been
seized, I separated myself from the system. This
way, I can avoid Marina Arusu's influence.
I don't really follow, but I'm happy you're okay.
Yes. I apologize for worrying you.

However, what has happened is all my
responsibility. Had I not fallen into this state,
everything could have been avoided.
That's not true! None of this is your fault.

It is. This all started because I was unable
to counter Marina Arusu's initial attack.

An attack from Marina? Like, a cyber-attack
on the Fraxinus? But then, if Marina is the
controller, how is that connect—
...Shin, your hypothesis is incorrect.
Reine-san? What do you mean?

(Immediately after asking, I caught onto
a vague feeling of discomfort.)

(We had thought Maria was an AI Spirit,
an irregularity from the outside. We helped
her on her mission to learn what love is.)

(However, that whole premise was wrong.
The irregularity in this world wasn't Maria.
It was the black-clothed Arusu: Marina.)
(If that were the case, one doubt remained.)

(The girl in front of me... Maria Arusu,
who is she?!)
...Shin, remain calm and listen. The girl\nin front of you is most likely... the Fraxinus'\ncontrol AI.
WHA?!
Maria is... the Fraxinus' AI?!

(Ratatoskr's aerial ship, the Fraxinus, is
equipped with a highly-advanced AI, or so
Kotori and Reine-san had told me.)

(Of course. It regulated the ships controls.
When I went on dates, it would present me with
choices. It observed the Spirits and me closely.)

Yes. When control was seized, because of the
open lock, all information was disclosed. I am
the ship's AI. You could say I am the Fraxinus.
...Because of Marina Arusu's attack, some of\nthe Fraxinus' protections were destroyed. It\nwas then that Marina Arusu entered.
...However, the AI trapped Marina Arusu into\na strongly-protected field, i.e. this virtually-\nsimulated reality system.
...Everything else from then on is as Marina\nArusu said. Because of the attack, a being called\nMaria awakened in the AI, with locked memories.
This is only speculation, but... most likely,\nshe was spawned to combat this unknown\nfoe. Thus, Maria was brought to life.

Then how do you explain Maria's quest to
understand love? Marina suggested she was
freed because Maria had obtained emotion.
...When her memories were locked by the\nsystem, her operating system's default function,\nto 'foster love', is all that remained, or...
...There could be another cause. The Fraxinus\nAI's primary function is to support you in your\nquest to date the Spirits.
It tracks the Spirits' mental states, and\noffers choices. One could say the Fraxinus\nAI was born to nurture love.
Born... to nurture love.
Yes. That is most likely why Arusu wished\nto learn the meaning of love.
...In truth, it's likely that the source of her\naspirations was one person. None other\nthan you.
However, this ended up becoming a huge\nweakness.

Yes. I had been subconsciously running the
Fraxinus' protections. However, there is only
one way to release them.
...Yes, that was by attracting the AI's heart.\nIn other words, it was her becoming more\nhuman.
Becoming... more human.

However, it was a double-edged sword. When
I let my guard down, becoming defenseless,
I accidentally relinquished those protections.

Then, this isn't your fault or responsibility.
I'm at fault, too!

No, it is my responsibility. There were surely
other ways to return you home. Even so, I gave
into my desires, and never sought them. Blame me.
I can't accept that!

Whether or not you can matters not! That is
the truth!
...Both of you, you do not have the time to\nbicker. The situation is worsening as we\nspeak.

Situation is worsening? What is Marina
doing...?
I previously thought her target was Ratatoskr's\ninformation and technology. However, it seems\nto be a simpler harassment.
A simpler harassment...?
Just a moment ago, the Fraxinus' main cannon\nstarted up. It hasn't fully charged yet, but it\nhas the capability to wipe out an entire city.

The Fraxinus' main cannon?! If she does that,
there's no telling what could happen...
It would no doubt ripple around the world.\nTo be honest, it is unfathomable.
Is there any way we can stop her?
Just to be upfront, it is quite difficult. Even\nso, there's no other way. We must do it.\nListen, Shin. The only way, is to...
